channel.title: Eh Help
channel.description:
could someone try to explain this to me its for school
o At least 3 pages of content o A navigation bar (or other system) o Some text (not just random words, but a few paragraphs) o At least 5 Graphics (photographs, clip art. Etc.) o Meta tags on each page o A title on each page o At least 1 page must have an example of a Header. o At least 4 hyperlinks (not including your navigation) o You must utilize at least 3 different sizes of fonts o 1 Email hyperlink o 1 of your pages must be your Contact page o At least 1 table must be used in your design

item.title: Eh Help
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

You could also follow my tutorial for your navbar :D. That would probably give you extra credit

Read full topic

item.title: Eh Help
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

a navigation bar are links between the 3 pages...

some text is just a short liktlle bit of words...

5 graphics means 5 images or 5 pictures (in total)

Meta tags :-p just put this on each page. (You put it between your tags. )

 <meta name="description" content="page #" />

Of course you should probably put the page number in place of '#'.

Header example would be this; (Put this as the first thing after your tag)

 <h1> Page # </h1>

Once again you should probably put hte page number in place of '#'.

Four hyperlinks...

 <a href="http://www.google.com/"> Google </a> | <a href="http://www.yahoo.com/"> Yahoo </a> | <a href="http://www.wikipedia.com/"> Wikipedia </a> | <a href="http://www.hotmail.com/"> Hotmail </a>


Just copy the hyperlinks directly.

Font sizes? Well you guys are just beginners so i wont go over your head...

 <font size="1"> Font 1 </font><font size="2"> Font 2 </font><font size="3"> Font 3 </font>

Email hyperlink...

 <a href="mailto:injuring@gmail.com"> E-mail me. </a>

on your contact page.... put the email hyperlink.

Read full topic

could someone try to explain this to me its for school

o At least 5 Graphics (photographs, clip art. Etc.)

o A title on each page
